column5: Anybody ever cross into canada in a rental car? Any issues I should know about going in or coming back to U.S.?

we did it once when we had to leave our car up there for repairs. no problem just have the papers. although you might get a 3rd degree if they understand rental cars. we were from chicago and had a rental car that was from california. they could not understand it. oh they finally gave up and we went on.
I did it 2 different times and was not even a question. Its a fairly common thing and like the post before just have your paper work just in case.
We do it every year,never had a problem.

Thanks guys, I appreciate the feedback, for some reason I felt like a rental car would just raise a red flag, its funny that even though your doing nothing wrong, dealing with the border patrol will make you nervous!
Have crossed into Ontario 10 times in a rental vehicle, no problem at all. Didn't even ask to see rental papers..
